content:
From: Rafal Kolanski <rafalk@cse.unsw.edu.au>
Greetings Everyone,

I'm porting a tool to Isabelle 2009-1, and the tool uses
OuterSyntax.read, which was removed in changeset 722cf4fdd4dd with the
comment "eliminated unused trace, read". That's cool, but what am I
supposed to use in its place?

Any advice welcome,

Sincerely,

Rafal Kolanski.

From: Makarius <makarius@sketis.net>
The last version with OuterSyntax.read is Isabelle2007; in Isabelle2008 it
is already gone, but OuterSyntax.parse is in its place. The changeset
722cf4fdd4dd also hints at this connection.

Deleting old/weakly defined functionality for outer syntax processing like
OuterSyntax.read has generally improved the situation.

What are your requirements then?

Makarius
